sentences.en: As the kitten touches it , it tilts at the floor.
sentences.cn: 它随着击碰倾侧,头不动, 眼不动,还呆呆地注视着地上.

sentences.en: Between the pitiable look and my sympathy stands that small white kitten.
sentences.cn: 那个眼神与我的好心中间隔着一只小白猫.
从某个地方传来猫咪喵喵的叫声。

sentences.en: I picked up the shaking kitten.
sentences.cn: 我捡起了那只颤抖着的小猫.

sentences.en: I've got a wee kitten in the flat.
sentences.cn: 我在公寓里养了一只小猫。

sentences.en: Let someone else waste their own time filtering out the kitten stories.
sentences.cn: 让别的某某人去浪费时间筛选这些小猫的故事吧。

sentences.en: No man can tame a tiger into a kitten by stroking it.
sentences.cn: 谁都不能抚摸一只老虎就使它驯服得像一只小猫.

sentences.en: She nursed her kitten all evening.
sentences.cn: 整个晚上她一直抱着她的小猫咪。

sentences.en: That cute puppy or kitten is not like a stuffed toy that can be left alone when you are finished with it.
sentences.cn: 那只可爱的小狗或者小猫并不只是像那些没有生命的玩偶，当你玩累了就丢在一旁。

sentences.en: The cat picked up her kitten by the scruff of its neck.
sentences.cn: 猫咬住幼崽的后颈把它叼了起来.

sentences.en: The kitten was black with white front paws and a white splotch on her chest.
sentences.cn: 那只黑色小猫长着白色前爪，胸口上有一块白斑。

sentences.en: The kitten was curled on a cushion on the sofa.
sentences.cn: 那只小猫在沙发垫子上蜷缩成了一团。

sentences.en: The kitten wormed its way through the just-open door.
sentences.cn: 小猫缩着身子从刚开了一点儿的门中挤过来。

sentences.en: The plump ginger kitten had settled comfortably in her arms and was purring enthusiastically.
sentences.cn: 胖乎乎的姜黄色小猫惬意地躺在她的怀里，大声地打着呼噜。

sentences.en: The tiny kitten approached the enormous bear and let out a purr and a mew.
sentences.cn: 那猫却走近体大腰圆的灰熊,冲它“喵呜“,“喵呜“地叫着.

sentences.en: We keep a little multicolored kitten in the house.

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)极度紧张，心烦意乱
